title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5020 - Disability Retirement Determinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5020 - Disability Retirement Determinations

State Regulations
§ 5020.1 - Standard for determining disability retirement for members who last joined the system prior to July 27, 1976, and who meet the eligibility requirements of section 511 of the Education Law
§ 5020.2 - Standard for determining disability retirement for members joining on or after July 27, 1976, but before September 1, 1983, and who meet the eligibility requirements of sections 506 and/or 507 of the Retirement and Social Security Law
§ 5020.3 - Standard for determining disability retirement for members joining on or after September 1, 1983, who meet the eligibility requirements of section 605 of the Retirement and Social Security Law
§ 5020.4 - Procedures for determining initial entitlement of an applicant to disability retirement and to continued entitlement to disability retirement
§ 5020.5 - Appointment of alternates to the Medical Board

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5020

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§504, 509, 511; Retirement and Social Security Law, §§506, 507, 605

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
